participant_1.name: Ella
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, Ella enjoys expressing herself through her art and values a healthy lifestyle.
participant_1.background: I'm proud to have a laptop that can keep up with my active lifestyle. I love going to the movies. I listen to folk music. I love fresh vegetables and fruit, especially when I can pick them myself. I am a musician with a day job.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and thoughtful, Ryan enjoys exploring different cultures and learning from others, especially through literature and music.
participant_2.background: I would love to have lunch with Murasaki Shikibu, the author of The Tale of Genji, to learn more about her writing process and the inspiration for her work. I love music and I like to keep my files organized. Last year I played video games while I worked on my masters degree. The kids will be my responsibility as my husband does not want them. I remember singing 'Intergalactic' with my friends in the car, despite my terrible singing voice.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing good as well, thanks! I love folk music. Do you have any favorite artists or bands?
I love folk music too! I'm a big fan of The Decemberists. What about you?
I love The Decemberists too! I also love Gregory Alan Isakov.
I've never heard of Gregory Alan Isakov, but I'll check them out! What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I'm a musician with a day job.
That's awesome! I used to play the guitar, but I haven't in a while.
You should pick it back up! It's a lot of fun.
I might have to! I love music.
Me too! It's one of the best things in life.
It really is. It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
